articles.title: UK variant of COVID-19 could become dominant strain in US by March: CDC - Clinical Daily News - McKnight's Long Term Care News
articles.description: A more contagious variant of COVID-19 that originated in the United Kingdom could be the predominant strain in the United States as early as March, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention warned Friday.

articles.author: AP
articles.title: California becomes first state to top 3 million virus cases - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The first coronavirus case in California was confirmed last Jan. 25. It took 292 days to get to 1 million infections on Nov. 11 and 44 days to top 2 million.
articles.content:
California on Monday became the first state to record more than 3 million known coronavirus infections.

articles.title: Cardiac health: If you cannot climb stairs this fast, you need to visit a doctor - Times of India
articles.description: According to a research, taking too much time to climb the stairs may be due to some underlying heart-related problems and you need to see a doctor immediately.

articles.title: Mental health issues can hurt immunity: Depression, stress may make Covid vaccines ineffective - ETHealthworld.com
articles.description: Emotional stressors can impair an individual's ability to ward off infections.
